com.lightstreamer.interfaces.metadata

Class MpnSubscriptionInfo.MpnApnsSubscriptionInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lightstreamer.interfaces.metadata.MpnSubscriptionInfo
      • com.lightstreamer.interfaces.metadata.MpnSubscriptionInfo.MpnApnsSubscriptionInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    MpnSubscriptionInfo

    public static class MpnSubscriptionInfo.MpnApnsSubscriptionInfo
extends MpnSubscriptionInfo
    Concrete subclass of MpnSubscriptionInfo for APNS platform type. Collects all the details of a push notifications specification for Apple's APNS.
    Edition Note:
    Push Notifications are not supported in Moderato edition.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.lightstreamer.interfaces.metadata.MpnSubscriptionInfo

        MpnSubscriptionInfo.MpnApnsSubscriptionInfo

    • Constructor Detail

      • MpnSubscriptionInfo.MpnApnsSubscriptionInfo

        public MpnSubscriptionInfo.MpnApnsSubscriptionInfo(java.lang.String applicationId,
                                           java.lang.String deviceToken,
                                           java.lang.String newDeviceToken,
                                           java.lang.String sound,
                                           java.lang.String badge,
                                           java.lang.String localizedActionKey,
                                           java.lang.String launchImage,
                                           java.lang.String format,
                                           java.lang.String localizedFormatKey,
                                           java.util.List arguments,
                                           java.util.Map customData,
                                           java.lang.String trigger)
        Used by Lightstreamer to create a MpnApnsSubscriptionInfo instance, collecting all the details of a push notifications specification for Apple's APNS.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - the app ID, also known as the bundle ID.
        deviceToken - the token of the device receiving these push notifications.
        newDeviceToken - the new token of the device, used when changing the device token.
        sound - the sound ID to be played when a push notification is delivered.
        badge - the value for the icon badge when a push notification is delivered.
        localizedActionKey - the key of the localized text to be used as the action button when a push notification is delivered.
        launchImage - the image name to be shown while the app is loading when the action. button is pressed after a push notification is delivered.
        format - the format for the push notification text when it is delivered.
        localizedFormatKey - the key of the localized text to be used as the format for the push notification text when it is delivered.
        arguments - the list of arguments to be used with a localized format key.
        customData - the map of custom key-value pairs to be added to the push notification.
        trigger - the expression the updates are checked against to trigger the notification.
